  1. Pompton Lakes Recycles


    Pompton Lakes now features Recycle Coach, an easy to use program and available app for download to help residents keep track of waste collection and recycle schedules on their own calendars.
    Read More

  1. Spring Hydrant Flushing Program

    The Pompton Lakes Borough Municipal Utilities Authority will conduct its Spring Hydrant Flushing Program beginning Monday, April 22, 2019 between the hours of 12:00 AM and 6:00 AM.
